resources.string: Welcome to Utriva. This game will challenge you about the various facts and knowledge of UT Austin. Attempt all questions for the highest possible score.
You also have the option of using a "Lifeline" in which two of the incorrect answer choices will disappear at the cost of 3 coins to your reward.
There are 15 multiple choice questions. When you got your answer selected, hit the NEXT button to be taken to the next question. Each question right is 5 coins added to your score.
